5.Pros: Free meal and uniform. Very punctual employees. Boss would work around schedule if needed. Drive thru very accurate on time.

6.Summary: "Grateful for the opportunity but happy to be out of there"
6.Pros: The experience. If you can handle the workload, the corporate politics, etc. then it is a great place to gain experience.
6.Cons: The company has changed drastically in recent years. The employees used to feel valued. The culture now leaves you feeling disposable rather than valued.
